entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
